48 #define PRIVATE_CLASS(Class) \
49  friend class Class##Private; \
50  inline const Class##Private* pimpl() const; \
51  inline Class##Private* pimpl();

73 
74 enum InterfaceFlag
75 {
76  READS_START = 0x01,
77  READS_END = 0x02,
78  WRITES_NEXT_START = 0x04,
79  WRITES_PREV_END = 0x08,
80 
81  CONNECT = READS_START | READS_END,
82  PROPAGATE_FORWARDS = READS_START | WRITES_NEXT_START,
83  PROPAGATE_BACKWARDS = READS_END | WRITES_PREV_END,
84  GENERATE = WRITES_PREV_END | WRITES_NEXT_START,
85 };
86 
87 using InterfaceFlags = Flags<InterfaceFlag>;
88 
93 constexpr InterfaceFlags invert(InterfaceFlags f) {
94  InterfaceFlags inv;
95  if (f & READS_START)
96  inv = inv | WRITES_NEXT_START;
97  if (f & WRITES_PREV_END)
98  inv = inv | READS_END;
99  if (f & READS_END)
100  inv = inv | WRITES_PREV_END;
101  if (f & WRITES_NEXT_START)
102  inv = inv | READS_START;
103  return inv;
104 };
105 
106 // some useful constants
107 constexpr InterfaceFlags UNKNOWN;
108 constexpr InterfaceFlags START_IF_MASK({ READS_START, WRITES_PREV_END });
109 constexpr InterfaceFlags END_IF_MASK({ READS_END, WRITES_NEXT_START });

118 class InitStageException : public std::exception
119 {
120  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const InitStageException& e);
121 
122 public:
123  explicit InitStageException() {}
124  explicit InitStageException(const Stage& stage, const std::string& msg) { push_back(stage, msg); }
125 
127  void push_back(const Stage& stage, const std::string& msg);
129  void append(InitStageException& other);
130 
132  operator bool() const { return !errors_.empty(); }
133 
134  const char* what() const noexcept override;
135 
136 private:
137  std::list<std::pair<const Stage*, const std::string>> errors_;
138 };

254 class PropagatingEitherWayPrivate;
262 class PropagatingEitherWay : public ComputeBase
263 {
264 public:
265  PRIVATE_CLASS(PropagatingEitherWay)
266  PropagatingEitherWay(const std::string& name = "propagating either way");
267 
268  enum Direction
269  {
270  AUTO = 0x00, // auto-derive direction from context
271  FORWARD = 0x01, // propagate forward only
272  BACKWARD = 0x02, // propagate backward only
273  };
274  void restrictDirection(Direction dir);
275 
276  virtual void computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) = 0;
277  virtual void computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) = 0;
278 
279  void sendForward(const InterfaceState& from, InterfaceState&& to, SubTrajectory&& trajectory);
280  void sendBackward(InterfaceState&& from, const InterfaceState& to, SubTrajectory&& trajectory);
281 
282 protected:
283  // constructor for use in derived classes
284  PropagatingEitherWay(PropagatingEitherWayPrivate* impl);
285 };

287 class PropagatingForwardPrivate;
288 class PropagatingForward : public PropagatingEitherWay
289 {
290 public:
291  PRIVATE_CLASS(PropagatingForward)
292  PropagatingForward(const std::string& name = "propagating forward");
293 
294 private:
295  // restrict access to backward method to provide compile-time check
296  void computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) override;
297  using PropagatingEitherWay::sendBackward;
298 };
299 
300 class PropagatingBackwardPrivate;
301 class PropagatingBackward : public PropagatingEitherWay
302 {
303 public:
304  PRIVATE_CLASS(PropagatingBackward)
305  PropagatingBackward(const std::string& name = "propagating backward");
306 
307 private:
308  // restrict access to forward method to provide compile-time check
309  void computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) override;
310  using PropagatingEitherWay::sendForward;
311 };

313 class GeneratorPrivate;
314 class Generator : public ComputeBase
315 {
316 public:
317  PRIVATE_CLASS(Generator)
318  Generator(const std::string& name = "generator");
319 
320  virtual bool canCompute() const = 0;
321  virtual void compute() = 0;
322  void spawn(InterfaceState&& state, SubTrajectory&& trajectory);
323  void spawn(InterfaceState&& state, double cost) {
324  SubTrajectory trajectory;
325  trajectory.setCost(cost);
326  spawn(std::move(state), std::move(trajectory));
327  }
328 
329 protected:
330  Generator(GeneratorPrivate* impl);
331 };

374 
376  void connect(const InterfaceState& from, const InterfaceState& to, SubTrajectory&& trajectory) {
377  connect(from, to, std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(std::move(trajectory)));
378  }
379  void connect(const InterfaceState& from, const InterfaceState& to, SubTrajectory&& trajectory, double cost) {
380  trajectory.setCost(cost);
381  connect(from, to, std::move(trajectory));
382  }
